seo.description: The Pistacho cigar rating community unites enthusiasts with authentic scores, expert reviews, and certification badges to uncover cigars worth savoring—and every member is invited to rate and share.
seo.keywords: Pistacho, cigar ratings, cigar community, cigar certification, cigar reviews
seo.ogDescription: Join the Pistacho cigar rating community to explore authentic scores, expert reviews, and certification badges that reveal cigars worth savoring, with every member invited to rate and share.

indexPage.searchPlaceholder: Search cigar name, origin, size, review, user...
indexPage.smokingWarning: Smoking and excessive drinking are harmful to your health. This site is only for users who have reached the legal age in your region; those who have not should refrain.

ratePage.title: Post a Cigar Review
ratePage.loginPrompt: Please log in to post a review.
ratePage.ratingTitlePlaceholder: A title gets more views (Max 35 chars)
ratePage.uploadImagesDesc: The first image will be the cover. Click the button on an image to set it as cover.
ratePage.imageSupport: Supports JPG, PNG, WEBP. Max 5MB each.
ratePage.selectFlavors: Select the main flavors you tasted (Optional):
ratePage.reviewPlaceholder: Enter your detailed tasting notes here...
ratePage.loginToUpload: Please log in to upload images.
ratePage.maxImages: You can only upload a maximum of {{max}} images.
ratePage.imageTooLarge: Image "{{name}}" is too large (over 5MB) and was skipped.
ratePage.imageTypeNotSupported: File type for "{{name}}" is not supported and was skipped.
ratePage.processingImage: Processing image {{current}} / {{total}}. Please adjust the crop.
ratePage.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset all selections and images?
ratePage.loginToSubmit: Please log in to submit a review.
ratePage.selectOneOption: Please select at least one rating option before proceeding.
ratePage.imageRequired: Please upload at least one image.

contactPage.metaDescription: Leave a message for the Pistacho administrators to report issues or share feedback.
contactPage.title: Contact the Community Admins
contactPage.description: If you encounter issues while using Pistacho or have suggestions, leave a message here for our admins. Please include your email so we can reply.
contactPage.messageHint: You can enter up to 1000 characters.
contactPage.submitSuccess: Thanks! Your message has been sent and we'll get back to you soon.
contactPage.formInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
contactPage.adminSectionDescription: Only admins can see all user messages.
contactPage.adminNeedsLogin: Log in to view the inbox.
contactPage.adminLoadError: Failed to load messages. Please try again later.

historyPage.title: My Ratings
historyPage.loginPrompt: Please log in to see your rating history.
historyPage.loginExpired: Your session has expired, please log in again.
historyPage.noCommentHistory: You haven't commented on other reviews yet.
historyPage.commentHistoryError: Failed to load your comment activity: {{msg}}
historyPage.incomingCommentsTitle: Comments other users left for me
historyPage.noIncomingComments: No comments from other users yet.

certifiedPage.title: Pistacho Certified Ratings
certifiedPage.subtitle: Excellent tasting notes curated by our super admins.
certifiedPage.loadDetailFailed: Could not load details for this rating (data not found).
certifiedPage.sessionStoreFailed: Could not save session data to view details.

resultsPage.loadErrorMsg: No rating data found! Please try again.
resultsPage.loadErrorMissing: Stored review data is missing essential info (score, grade, cigar info). Please try rating again.

comments.title: Community Comments
comments.loginPrompt: Please sign in before posting a comment.
comments.muted: You have been muted and cannot post comments.
comments.empty: No comments yet—be the first to share your thoughts!

meta.descriptionTemplate: Overall impression: {{name}} from {{origin}} (size: {{size}}) earned {{grade}} ({{score}}). Reviewed by {{reviewer}}.

narrative.part1: This tasting featured the {{name}} (size: {{size}}) from {{origin}}.
narrative.part4: Overall, based on the Pistacho Cigar Rating System, the final grade is "{{grade}} - {{gradeName}}". The Pistacho rating scale (highest to lowest) is {{hierarchy}}.
narrative.noNarrativeData: Could not generate narrative summary (missing data).

summary.noSummaryData: Could not generate rating details (missing data).

shareCard.qrError: QR Code container or library not found, or ratingId missing.
shareCard.generateFailed: Failed to auto-generate or add share image:

resultsPage.narrativeGenFailed: Cannot generate narrative summary (score calculation failed).

errors.noRatingDataFound: No rating data found in Session Storage.
errors.missingEssentialData: Rating data is incomplete, cannot display report.
errors.notADraft: This rating has already been saved and cannot be saved again.
errors.confirmDeleteProfile: Are you sure you want to delete profile '{{id}}'?
errors.invalidJSONFormat: Uploaded file is not a valid configuration JSON.
errors.invalidSessionData: Stored rating data format is invalid.
errors.permissionInsufficientSuperAdmin: Super Admin permission required to access this page. Your current permission is {{role}}.
errors.loginRequiredForPage: Login required to access this page.
errors.permissionDeniedAdmin: Permission denied, Admin or Super Admin role required.
errors.permissionInsufficient: Insufficient permission. Your current permission is {{role}}.

configPage.title: Cigar Tasting Configuration Management
configPage.description: Manage rating standards. Changes will sync to the main app live after publishing.
configPage.promptNewName: Enter the name for the new configuration profile:
configPage.confirmDeleteProfile: Are you sure you want to delete profile '{{id}}'?
configPage.jsonLoaded: JSON file loaded into editor. Remember to Save or Publish.

rolePage.title: User Role Management (Super Admin)
rolePage.emailPlaceholder: Enter email of user to query or modify
rolePage.promptQuery: Enter email and click Query to view or modify user role.

appearanceAndConstruction.title: 1. Appearance & Construction
appearanceAndConstruction.detail: The physical manufacturing quality of the cigar.

burnAndDraw.title: 2. Burn & Draw
burnAndDraw.detail: Core elements determining if the tasting experience is smooth and enjoyable.

flavorAndFeel.title: Flavor & Sensation
flavorAndFeel.detail: Taste sensations like aroma, complexity, nicotine, etc.
flavorAndFeel.secondaryAromaIntensity: Pleasant Secondary Aroma Intensity (excluding coffee, leather, spice; mainly floral, spice, creamy, sweet, etc.)
flavorAndFeel.secondaryAromaUniqueness: Difficulty or Premiumness of Obtaining Secondary Aroma in Other Cigars

instagramAdmin.loginRequired: Please sign in and make sure you are a Super Admin to use the Instagram sharing console.
instagramAdmin.title: Instagram Sharing
instagramAdmin.configSubtitle: Save Instagram Graph API tokens, App ID/Secret, and webhook verification token.
instagramAdmin.configHint: Only super admins can view these credentials. If posting fails, please verify tokens are still valid.
instagramAdmin.selectSubtitle: Pick a rating, edit its caption, and queue it for Instagram.
instagramAdmin.captionPlaceholder: Add caption, hashtags, and rating details...
